data_table.description: Reproductive History Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RHXAFLAG
variable.description: RHXAFLAG [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA01
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Age when menstrual periods started. Q1 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA02
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Number of pregnancies. Q2 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA03
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Number of live born children. Q3 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA04
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Have you had any menstrual periods during the past 2 years? Q4 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA06
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Number of periods missed in last 2 years. Q6 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA07
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Have you reached menopause? Q7 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA08
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Age when menopause began. Q8 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA09
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Was your menopause natural or the result of surgery or radiation? Q9 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA10
variable.description: [Menstrual history and pregnancies]. Are you having hot flashes? Q10 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA11
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Ever taken birth control pills? Q11 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA12
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. At what age did you start taking them for the first time? Q12 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA13
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Currently taking birth control pills? Q13 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA14
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. At what age did you stop taking them? Q14 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA15
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Total years used birth control pills. Q15 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA16
variable.description: [Hormone use]. Have you ever taken female hormones pills, shots, or implants, not including birth control pills? Q16 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA17
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 1. Q17 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA18
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 1 code. Q18 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA19
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 1 use began. Q19 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA20
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Currently taking hormone 1? Q20 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA21
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 1 use ended. Q21 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA22
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Total years used hormone 1. Q22 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA23
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Number days used hormone 1 in a 4 week period. Q23 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA24
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 2. Q24 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA25
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 2 code. Q25 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA26
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 2 use began. Q26 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA27
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Currently taking hormone 2? Q27 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA28
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 2 use ended. Q28 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA29
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Total years used hormone 2. Q29 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA30
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Number days used hormone 2 in a 4 week period. Q30 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA31
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 3. Q31 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA32
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 3 code. Q32 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA33
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 3 use began. Q33 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA34
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Currently taking hormone 3? Q34 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA35
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 3 use ended. Q35 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA36
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Total years used hormone 3. Q36 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA37
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Number days used hormone 3 in a 4 week period. Q37 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA38
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 4. [BIRTH CONTROL PILLS, ESTROGEN, PROGESTERONE-GENERIC, PROVERA, SHOTS ( ), SHOTS AT CLINIC, STIBESTRAL, VAGINAL CREAM]. Q38 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA39
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Female hormone 4 code. Q39 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA40
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 4 use began. Q40 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA41
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Currently taking hormone 4? Q41 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA42
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Age when hormone 4 use ended. Q42 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA43
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Total years used hormone 4. Q43 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA44
variable.description: [Birth control pills]. Number Days used hormone 4 in a 4 week period. Q44 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA45
variable.description: [Gynecologic surgery]. Have you had surgery to have your uterus or ovaries removed (partial or total hysterectomy)? Q45 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA46
variable.description: [Gynecologic surgery]. Uterus removed? Q46 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA47
variable.description: [Gynecologic surgery]. Age when uterus removed. Q47 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA48
variable.description: [Gynecologic surgery]. Have you had either one or both ovaries removed? Q48 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA49
variable.description: [Gynecologic surgery]. Age when ovary or ovaries removed. Q49 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA52
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Form coder. Q52 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: RHXA05MONTHS
variable.description: Months of last menstrual period since exam 1 [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reproductive History Form, exam 1]
